title: Home One
description: An abstract reflection on the essence of belonging.
content: A digital exploration of what it means to arrive, to settle, and to become.

title: Home Two
description: A creative interpretation of comfort and familiarity.
content: A project that contemplates the patterns and rituals that define our sense of home.

title: Home Three
description: A conceptual journey into the meaning of being at home.
content: An abstract interface inviting reflection on presence, memory, and identity.
